Product Title: Flotig Long Pre stretched Braiding Hair 30Inch 8 packs Professional Itch Free Hot Water Setting Synthetic Fiber Crochet Braiding Hair Extension Twist Braid (30Inch, 1B)
Review Date: 2020/11/06
Store: Flotig
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Flotig', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '30 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '13.34 x 9.96 x 3.62 inches; 1.67 Pounds', 'UPC': '782905065680'}
Review Text: I LOVE that it’s so long. It’s soft and lightweight. Tangles and sheds just a little. Comes in an 8 pack which is more than enough to achieve many styles. It also had hair accessories and a crochet tool included. Overall, I like it. It’s quality hair.
Review Title: Flotig Long Pre stretched Braiding Hair 30Inch 8 packs
Rating: 5.0

1000 Pcs Acrylic Nail Kit, Coffin Nails Long Fake Nails Tips For Nail Salons And DIY Nail, Artificial Half Cover Nail Tips With Box, Nature & Clear, 10 Size
VEAFX
{'Color': 'Clear', 'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic, Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Brand': 'VEAFX', 'Style': 'French', 'Package Dimensions': '7.2 x 7 x 1.4 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '782912939134'}
Lots of nails to work with. They aren’t as thick as I’d like them to be. They’re more on the thin, flimsy plastic side. They do stay in place once applied. Overall, they’re good for what they’re for. I like that you get the regular coke and a clear set as well. Great starter kit.
1000 Pcs Acrylic Nail Kit
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
PRETTY FRANK
{'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I really love this deodorant. It doesn’t contain aluminum. As it states, a little goes a long way. I work in Nursing so my workload is very heavy and I sweat a lot. I’m still smelling fresh when using this. It’s easy to apply. Just grab a pinch, rub it between two fingers and apply. You don’t need to use a lot. It has a nice consistency. Not sticky. Not too think or too thick. Doesn’t stain hands or clothing. I wish the scent was a bit stronger but I still love it overall.
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant

profile:
The user exhibits a strong preference for beauty and personal care products that emphasize quality, convenience, and aesthetics. They prioritize high-quality hair care items that offer manageability, comfort, and a natural look, particularly favoring lightweight options suitable for extended wear. Recently, they have shown interest in versatile beauty tools, such as nail kits, which underscores their desire for practicality alongside aesthetic appeal.

In their latest interaction, the user purchased a long, synthetic braiding hair, praising its softness and lightweight nature while noting minor issues with tangling and shedding. This experience reinforces their commitment to finding products that not only meet high standards of quality but also align with their personal style and aesthetic preferences.

Overall, the user focuses on acquiring easy-to-manage, high-quality items that enhance their beauty routine and promote a fresh, natural, and visually appealing look. Their holistic approach to beauty reflects a dedication to finding items that seamlessly blend functionality with aesthetic value, ensuring a satisfying and versatile beauty experience across multiple facets of personal care.
